name: Colombia Cultural Club
description: EAT with the Colombia Cultural Club, a group of friends that promotes Colombian Culture through social events. They will be making pots of Colombian coffee, hot dogs and brochettas (Latin American shish kabobs) and fresh mangoes for desserts. Come discover Colombian culture and fill your tummies with traditional street food of Latin America. Eat, Play, Live at Carnaval del Sol!

name: Colombian Food
products: Beef Stuffed Patties, Beef Roast, Smoked Ribs, Beans, Rice, Plantain Stuffed with Cheese
description: Colombian Food takes you through the bustling and vibrant streets of Latin American countries overflowing with culture and history. Through the mouth watering foods you will get to know the people and how the land and the customs fuel their culinary passion. Come enjoy Beef Patties bursting with seasoned meats, slow roasted Beef Roasts, Smoky barbequed Ribs, Beans, Rice, and Plantains Stuffed with Cheese.
